episodes.title: Opening statements in Lori Vallow Daybell's murder conspiracy trial begins Monday
episodes.description:
Lori Vallow Daybell pleaded not guilty and is representing herself at trial. (Video via CBS News)

https://www.krem.com/article/news/crime/live-updates-lori-vallow-daybell-murder-conspiracy-trial-arizona/75-16db0576-02c6-419b-8e3e-7764255c6c62

HOW TO ADD THE KREM+ APP TO YOUR STREAMING DEVICE 
ROKU: Add the channel from the ROKU store or by searching for KREM in the Channel Store.
https://channelstore.roku.com/details/8b5b60b5e910802e55af2274311b77af/spokane-news-from-krem 
Fire TV: search for "KREM" to find the free app to add to your account. Another option for Fire TV is to have the app delivered directly to your Fire TV through Amazon.
